GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id with the most recent comments first

CORE: POST /api/articles/:article_id/com.description: adds a comment for an article and responds with the posted comment

comment.body: In coding, simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
comment.author: butter_bridge

CORE: PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the current article's vote property and responds with the article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

CORE: DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment by comment_id with status 204 and no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
